availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Littlepage, Jr. (Anderson County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Son of James S. Littlepage and Dorothy Littlepage. Attorney in Anderson County in 1860. Farmer in Anderson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson county, pp. 228B-229A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 419.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Vol. 1, 1863, p. 298, p. 315 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on May 7, 2020).
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Anderson County Administrator Bonds, 1852-1970, p. 64 of microfilm (Accessed through ancestry.com on May 7, 2020).
